text: Giuliano Amato (; born 13 May 1938) is an Italian politician. He was the Prime Minister of Italy, first from 1992 to 1993 and again from 2000 to 2001. ==References== ==Other websites== *Giuliano Amato's Project Syndicate op/eds * Giuliano Amato teaching at the Master in International Public Affairs at the LUISS Guido Carli University School of Government in Rome. Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Italy Category:Politicians from Turin
title: Giuliano Amato
